name: Catacombs of Kas
description:
You are the last kings knight, you need to find Kas in his final resting place the dark catacombs, as you battle ferocious monsters and beat back the evil gaining power and glory. Catacombs of Kas is an action RPG style adventure game set in the dungeons and vast lands of Kas you have to crawl your way into victory by gaining powerful items, and skills.
Key Features:

Striking hand-drawn artwork
Our artwork was had drawn and painted, with the cartoon aspect you will never see dull environments and boring levels!

Conquer The World of Stroni
Play through a campaign, facing off against the minions of Kas as you fight for control of Stroni.
Test Your Mettle
with the ranking system you can fight other players to be the lord of Stroni become the king and gain special rewards!
